patthana16.15:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.15:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:2.1_1: Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:2.1_2: Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.15:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.15:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana16.15:5.1_0: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:5.1_1: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:5.1_2: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo ca naakusalo naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
